name: docker-registry-browser
description: Docker Registry Browser provides a web-based UI for browsing, analyzing, and deleting Docker images from a private registry. It offers tagging, search, and simple deployment via Docker.
features: Registry Browsing: View all images in your private registry. Clear visual overview.
Image Analysis: Inspect layers, tags, and metadata. Detailed image information.
Delete Operations: Remove unwanted images to free space. Clean registry management.
Search Functionality: Find images quickly with powerful search. Locate what you need fast.
Tag Management: Browse and compare different versions. Track your releases.
Self-Hosted: Manage your private Docker registry easily. Complete control over images.
